data.title: BibTeX field: issn [with examples]
data.meta_description: Learn all about the non-standrad BibTeX issn field. Our examples will tell you how and when to use the issn field.
data.text:
BibTeX field: issn

How to use the issn field in BibTeX?

The issn field is used to store the International Standard Serial Number (ISSN) of a journal or magazine. It is a non-standard BibTeX field and is only supported by a handful of styles. You can find ISSN numbers on the publishers' websites or you can use the ISSN Portal to look up ISSN numbers.

BibTeX styles that support the issn field
